title: About
body:
I am a rising senior majoring in computer science at University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign (UIUC). I will be an intern at the Illumination and Imaging Lab (IMIL) at the Robotics Institue, Carnegie Mellon University (CMU). I was a one-semester visiting student at National Taiwan University. My research interest lies in machine/deep learning, computer vision/graphics, and computational photography. Specifically, I currently focus more on 3D side of computer graphics/vision.
